original_text: As soon as the Israelite people received Hezekiah's message, they brought their gifts to the temple. They brought the first part of their grain, wine, olive oil, honey and all the crops that grew in their fields. They brought one tenth part of all the food that they grew, so there was a lot of it.
korean_text: 왕의 명령이 내리자 곧 이스라엘 자손이 곡식과 포도주와 기름과 꿀과 밭의 모든 소산의 첫 열매들을 풍성히 드렸고 또 모든 것의 십일조를 많이 가져왔으며

sentences.original_text: As soon as the Israelite people received Hezekiah's message
they brought their gifts to the temple
They brought the first part of their grain
and all the crops that grew in their fields
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신들의 밭에서 자란 모든 작물

sentences.original_text: They brought one tenth part of all the food that they grew
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들이 키운 모든 음식의 십일조를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: so there was a lot of it
